thread.title: great location, helpful desk, good breakfast, better than average wifi
thread.title_full: great location, helpful desk, good breakfast, better than average wifi - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: josephmansour
title: great location, helpful desk, good breakfast, better than average wifi
text: Excellent place to stay, very short walk from the Spanish Steps. Rooms are not large (but it is in the heart of Rome), but recently redone and lovely. Many options for breakfast. One day laundry service. Excellent suggestions for where to eat locally.
